item.description:
Hi Folks,

I wanted to pass on info for an event Sunday, May 20. The West Hartford MDC is having a recreation day from 9:00-1:00. To read more event info the site is www.themdc.com/talcottmountain.htm. There is a bird walk, yoga, biking information, and horse demonstrations. I am going for the Orienteering event. Apparently, it is a sport where you hike with a pupose using a map to find your way. Pass this info on to those you know. If you know anyone who is turned on by maps, I would enjoy doing the couse with other folks. I have no interest in the Charlie hike so I am trying this.

Hope everyone is great!
Janice

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: MDC West Hartford Event suggested by Janice
